version_description: - general enhancements and bug fixes
- General enhancements and bug fixes

Wickr Pro - Join millions worldwide who rely on Wickr to secure their most critical communications. Enterprises and teams choose Wickr to securely collaborate, facilitate data retention and policy management.

Newly Released Features:

- Share Activity - Allow other users to see if you’re online, idle and last time active. Now indicated by a green dot next to your avatar
- Wickr Open Access Strict Mode - Network Administrators can now force network users to have Wickr Open Access always enabled.
- New User Guided Tour: in-app guide covering Wickr features for new users
- Improved UI Navigation: Quickly navigate between Conversations, Rooms, Contacts and Settings
- General enhancements and bug fixes
- General enhancements and bug fixes
- General enhancements and bug fixes

Wickr Pro - Join millions worldwide who rely on Wickr to secure their most critical communications. Enterprises and teams choose Wickr to securely collaborate, facilitate data retention and policy management.

Newly Released Features:

* Updated User Profile Design
* Increased initial results in search from 3 to 5 before expanding
* General enhancements and bug fixes

Wickr Pro - Join millions worldwide who rely on Wickr to secure their most critical communications. Enterprises and teams choose Wickr to securely collaborate, facilitate data retention and policy management.
- added fix for presence not working
- General enhancements and bug fixes

Wickr Pro - Join millions worldwide who rely on Wickr to secure their most critical communications. Enterprises and teams choose Wickr to securely collaborate, facilitate data retention and policy management.

Newly Released Features:

Improved User Verification: easily validate the security of your end-to-end encryption with your contacts through shared security verification codes, or simply scan a QR code on their screen.
Customer Support Logging: users can enable application logs to share with customer support if things go wrong. This is turned off by default. Your application logs are stored locally on device and can be erased at anytime.
Added support for security code autofill with QuickType.
Improved call quality.
General enhancements and bug fixes.

Wickr Pro - Join millions worldwide who rely on Wickr to secure their most critical communications. Enterprises and teams choose Wickr to securely collaborate, facilitate data retention and policy management.

Newly Released Features:
- We now support password complexity requirements as set by your administrator
- General enhancements and bug fixes.

Pro:

Wickr Pro - Join millions worldwide who rely on Wickr to secure their most critical communications. Enterprises and teams choose Wickr to securely collaborate, facilitate data retention and policy management.

- We’ve refreshed your Settings screens to be more organized and consistent across other platforms.
- Users may now delete their profile avatar [iOS] (for real this time).
- General enhancements and bug fixes

Thank you for your continued support of Wickr PRO!
- General enhancements and bug fixes

Wickr Pro - Join millions worldwide who rely on Wickr to secure their most critical communications. Enterprises and teams choose Wickr to securely collaborate, facilitate data retention and policy management.

- Real Time Location Sharing - securely share your real-time location in rooms or conversations
- Support for new Pro Administrator controls, such as turning off file attachments and calling
- Quick Responses - pre-configured text messages that can be sent in a few taps. Note: your network administrator will need to set these up for you.
- General enhancements and bug fixes

Thank you for your continued support of Wickr PRO!

Thank you for your continued support of WickrPro! As always, we have some goods in store for you with our latest release.

We’ve made it easier for you to tell when out-of-network Wickr users are in your rooms or conversation, just in case you’d rather be a little more careful about you share in those spaces.
By popular demand, we’ve changed the “Invite to Wickr” behavior for non-administrators to share referral links to download WickrPro instead sending invites to join the network directly. - -

- Administrators can still send network invites within the app.
- Improved calling experience, general enhancements, and bug fixes.

Thank you for your continued support of WickrPro!

We’re introducing a new way to share file attachments with your fellow Wickr users with File Pinning. Room moderators can now “pin” previously shared files to a room. These files are persistent for the life of the room (or until unpinned by a moderator) and are available to new room participants without having to re-share. This feature applies to group conversations as well.

We’ve also changed the way you interact with messages. Instead of swiping a message to delete, star, or recall a message, iOS users should now use a long press. We’ve introduced this change for more flexibility with adding message interactions... like file pinning!

Per usual, we’re squashing bugs as we find them. We hope you enjoy the latest version of WickrPro!
- General enhancements and bug fixes

This week’s release is focused on minor bug fixes and other general enhancements.
Thank you for your continued support of WickrPro!

Thanks to the Wickr community feedback, in this version we’re introducing several new Wickr enhancements. We hope you enjoy them! And, keep the suggestions coming!

* Google Single Sign On: By popular demand, we’ve added support for signing in with Google SSO credentials. Your network administrator will need to set the SSO parameters from the Network Dashboard.

* We continue to address bugs as we find them. Please share any feedback and issues to support@wickr.com.
- general enhancements and bug fixes

We’re back with a big update! Back by popular demand, Secure Shredder has returned to sanitize your deleted data. Please enjoy this latest release of WickrPro:

- Secure Shredder Controls: Silver and Gold Wickr Pro administrators now have more control of Secure Shredder including adjusting the intensity of the shredder running in the background and allowing users to run Secure Shredder on-demand.
- Call Confirmation: we’ve heard a lot of pain from users initiating accidental calls. The application will now prompt you to confirm you’re trying to start a call and let you know how many participants will receive the call.
- Out of Network User Prompt: The application will now warn you before attempting to add an “out of network” user to a room or conversation.
- Markdown: Limited support for markdown formatting added, including *bold*, _italic_, ~strikethrough~, `inline code`, and ```code blocks```.

We continue to address bugs as we find them. Please share any feedback and issues to support@wickr.com.

Thank you for continuing to support WickrPro!
- general enhancements and bug fixes

In this release, we’re adding a number of enhancements such as:

En Français! We now support French-Canadien language localization. Want to see additional language support come to WickrPro? Please let us know at support@wickr.com
Not all improvements make it to the release notes, but rest assured each release includes polish, refinements, and bug fixes.

Thank you for continuing to support WickrPro!
- Bug fixes and general enhancements

In this release, we’re introducing Message Replies. Users can now reply to a specific message in their chat, making rooms and groups chats easier to understand who is replying to whom. Message replies will include the original quoted message, and tapping/clicking ( long “press hold” on message ) on the reply will navigate a user to the original message.

Each release also includes minor enhancements and bug fixes. Thank you for continuing to support WickrPro!

Thank you for your continued support of Wickr Pro! This release is focused on bug fixes and minor enhancements.
- We’ve continued to iron out some of the user experience with room management based off user feedback
Thank you for your continued support of Wickr Pro! This release is focused on bug fixes and minor enhancements.

- Fixed an issue where the keyboard would overlap your message replies.
- Fixed an issue where expiration times would display incorrectly.
- Fixed an issue where @-mentions in a message reply displayed blue.
- Fixed an issue where some users could not join calls
- General enhancements and bug fixes
- general enhancements and bug fixes
- general enhancements and bug fixes

This release focuses on general enhancements and bug fixes.

- Fixed an issue where users received all notifications in rooms that were set to @me notifications

- SSO users can now sync message history when adding a new device.
- Fixed an issue where users removed from your network could still view messages

This release is focused on bug fixes and other general enhancements.

- Fixed an issue where a user could long-press on message types that shouldn’t support the long press.
- Fixed an issue where the app wouldn’t display a warning when attempting to reconnect to a network connection when Wickr Open Access was on.

New Year, new features from Team Wickr!

- Administrators can now enable two-factor authentication for their network. Users adding a new device can use their current device to verify their identity. If another device is not available, they can also confirm with their email address.
- Message replies have been expanded to handle more message types like images, files, location sharing, and more.
- Fixed an issue where active users would sometimes show as deleted users
- Fixed an issue where users would still receive messages from people they blocked

Thank you for using Wickr Pro. We’re constantly making improvements to the app and behind the scenes.
- Room moderators and group members can rename Saved Items. Cryptic file names can now be a thing of the past.

Thank you for using Wickr Pro. We’re constantly making improvements to the app and behind the scenes.
- Room moderators and group members can rename Saved Items. Cryptic file names can now be a thing of the past.

Thank you for using Wickr Pro. We’re constantly making improvements to the app and behind the scenes. Here’s what we have in this week’s release:

- Link Previews - users can now (optionally) turn on the ability to send link previews. The sender can pull specific metadata from a URL such as a web page title, description and an image to provide recipients with additional context to the link.

Thank you for using Wickr Pro. This release is focused on general enhancements and bug fixes.

- Fixed an issue where some users could not turn on biometric authentication.
- Fixed an issue where a user would show up in their own contact list.

Thank you for using Wickr Pro! We are releasing another round of app improvements. This update is focused on general enhancements and bug fixes.

Enhancements
- Users can now add links to “Saved Items”
- Rooms now support 200 users
- Dark/light mode will now match your iOS settings.
- users can now choose their browser for SSO authentication
- fixed an issue where a user couldn’t pin or rename files
- fixed an issue where others would appear as unverified when they are not
- fixed an issue where Presence still appeared when disabled
- improved fuzzy search performance with users with the large contacts list

Thank you for using Wickr Pro! This week’s release is focused on general enhancements and bug fixes such as:

- Group conversations (more than 2 users) will now be included in your Rooms list. Conversations have been changed to “Direct Messages”
- Administrators can now force network users to use TCP for all calls.
- We’ve added some error messaging to give you more information when your messages don’t make it to their intended user, or when their messages don’t make it to you. For more information, visit support.wickr.com.~
- Improved device synchronization for SSO users
- Fixed an issue that broke paging on the contacts screen
- Fixed an issue where a video would display upside down during a call.
- Fixed an issue where turning off the “Secure Shredder” would not work as intended.
- Fixed an issue where screenshots would not trigger a message.
- Improved contacts screen fuzzy search results

Thank you for using Wickr Pro! We’ve heard your feedback on our recent release and are exploring ways to improve.

- We’ve made some changes to the registration/sign-in screen for new and returning users.
- Fixed a UI glitch where overlapping activity and verification icons could display a little “Ghost”
- Fixed an issue where calls would continue to ring when they’ve been answered on a different device.
- Made improvements to the voice and video calling experience

- General enhancements and bug fixes
- Call participants are now sorted alphabetically

- General enhancements and bug fixes
- Call participants are now sorted alphabetically

This release is focused on general enhancements and bug fixes.

- CallKit support added. You can enable this in your Notification settings.
- bug fixes and general enhancements

This release is focused on general enhancements and bug fixes.

- Added new ‘Appearances’ setting to allow users to set the width of text message bubbles.

In this release, we’re happy to announce a much asked for a feature: emoji reactions! Use emoji reactions as a quick response to any message or poll your friends and colleagues. Long press any message to apply emoji reactions.

- We are also dropping support for iOS 10.
- Fixed a bug that where a user could not turn off burn-on-read once set
- bug fixes and general enhancements
- bug fixes and general enhancements

In this release, we’ve made some improvements under the hood for messaging. These improvements allow users to communicate with up to 500 people in a room without a significant slow down due to message encryption.

- Introducing “Audio Only” calling, for use in low bandwidth situations. This will prevent other caller’s video and screen share from streaming to your device, improving call performance in low bandwidth situations. You can find this toggle under Settings > Connectivity.
- bug fixes and general enhancements

Thank you for using Wickr Pro! This release is focused on making small improvements to the user experience for our users that log in with Single Sign On (SSO).

- SSO users can now log out of all of their devices simultaneously from one device.
- Additionally, for our SSO users without device cameras, we’ve replaced the Master Recovery Key QR code with a text string that can be easily shared with other devices.
- Updated the copy for unread message notifications when logged out from SSO to let users know they need to re-authenticate first.
- Various general enhancements and bug fixes.
- bug fixes and general enhancements

Thank you for using Wickr Pro! In this release we are happy to introduce some new and amazing features:

- Users can view an active in-progress call banner in a Room/Group and can easily join a call vs searching for the “click to join” call message
- Users can view “add more moderators” reminder banner after Room creation to ensure there are always back-up/alternate moderators for Room controls
- Users can sort their Rooms/Groups/Direct Messages by most recent & by names (alphanumeric)
- Users can drag their desired items (text, image) and drop it into our Wickr app seamlessly

Thank you for using Wickr Pro! This release is focused on general enhancements and bug fixes. We’ve heard your feedback that the UX to initiate multiple calls in a room caused more confusion than flexibility, so we have removed that functionality.

- Fixed an issue where users were unable to return to the calling screen when they navigate out to the dashboard
- Fixed an issue when sending messages using a physical keyboard with an iPad
- Fixed an issue where users would not receive notifications
- Fixed an issue where users could not create a personal room without adding users

This release is focused on enhancing the experience of finding messages that are important to you. Your rooms list will now display an extra unread badge for rooms that you have been @-mentioned in. Additionally, users will now enter a room at their last read message, not the latest unread message. Users can toggle between all unread @-mentions without needing to scroll.

- In response to user feedback, we removed the ability to host multiple calls in a room.
- Fixed an issue where users could not send messages to other verified users.
- General enhancements and bug fixes.
- bug fixes and general enhancements

Thank you for updating to the latest Wickr Pro!

- This release is focused on general enhancements and bug fixes.
- Users can now switch to audio-only during a call

Thank you for updating to the latest Wickr Pro! This release is focused on general enhancements and bug fixes.

- Fixed an issue where some users would experience a crash when starting a call.
- Fixed an issue users could not start a conversation with uncontacted users.

Thank you for updating to the latest Wickr Pro! In this release we’re excited to share some new and exciting enhancements.

- Users can now join broadcast calls that support up to 500 participants.
- All rooms now have a room history available to track who has been added, removed, made a moderator, pinned files, etc. We’ve reduced room control messages to one line to save screen real estate.
- Link previews now include images. These are fetched from the message sender and can be turned off.
- We added a progress bar when syncing messages to a device that’s been offline for an extended period of time.
- General enhancements and bug fixes.
- bug fixes and general enhancements
- bug fixes and general enhancements

Thank you for updating to the latest Wickr Pro! This release is focused on minor improvements and bug fixes.

- Users can now enable or disable Message Drafts [Settings > Privacy & Security]. When enabled, unsent messages will be preserved when a user navigates away from a conversation.
- Pinned links will now preserve the link image preview.
- General enhancements & bug fixes.
- bug fixes and general enhacements
Thank you for updating to the latest Wickr Pro! This release is focused on minor improvements and bug fixes.
Thank you for updating to the latest Wickr Pro! This release is focused on minor improvements and bug fixes.
Thank you for updating to the latest Wickr Pro! This release is focused on minor improvements and bug fixes.

Thank you for updating to the latest Wickr Pro!

We’re improving our calling experience by switching our audio codec to Opus (instead of AAC). You should experience improved audio quality overall.

Thank you for updating to the latest Wickr Pro!

This update introduces language localization support for German and Spanish

Thank you for updating to the latest Wickr Pro! We’re excited to announce the introduction of a much-requested feature: pinned chats! Have a room or conversation you want to keep at the top of your list? just long-press or swipe right for any chat and pin it to the top of your list.

- All Rooms and DMs with unread messages now show in a dynamic “Unread” inbox at the top of your list
- bug fixes and general enhancements
Thank you for updating to the latest version of Wickr Pro! This version is focused on general enhancements and bug fixes.
